topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555019c36368726c18ec0200#post_555019c36368726c18ec0200
[bq="HJSDGCE"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5550195b6368727326a40b00#post_5550195b6368727326a40b00
Well, technically we don't know what will happen.
It's a very weird subject.[/bq]
The problem with cultural marxism is that in theory it's supposed to work, but in practice what it actually does is destabilize countries.  The problem with any of the marxist ideologies is that in practice they're incredibly self destructive.  Karl Marx was a smart man, *BUT* he should have just stuck to criticizing capitalism instead of vomiting a bunch of crap out his mouth.

If cultural marxists were to actually win then my money is on a new dark age.
